scripts.package:prod:uniqueField: npm run precompiled:uniqueField && tfx extension create --rev-version --output-path ./out
scripts.publish:test:uniqueField: npm run precompiled:uniqueField && tfx extension publish --rev-version --manifest-globs vss-extension-uniqueField.json --output-path out --service-url https://tfs.devopshub.cn/ --token
